text: Nambo ŵanganyao ŵatite: “Ambuje ŵetu! Talikanganyani igono ya ulendo yetu.” Ni ŵalitesile lupuso achimisyene, basi ni twatesile ŵanganyao kuŵa ngani (sisyesyene syaŵandu ŵakala syakwajamuka nasyo ŵandu ŵasambano), ni twapwilingenye kwapwilinganya kosope kwene. Chisimu mu yalakweyo muŵele mwana imanyisyo kwa jwalijose jwali jwakupilila nnope, jwakutogolela kwejinji
